players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Diana last night and discovered she is the mafioso. We should vote her out immediately."
Charlie: "Bob, that's a very bold claim to make right away. If you're really the detective, why would you reveal yourself so early and make yourself a target?"
Diana: "Diana, you're just trying to deflect suspicion. Why accuse me without proof? We should vote for Diana now."
You: "I stand by my investigation—Diana is the mafioso. Charlie, we need to vote her out now to protect the town."
Charlie: "Bob, your claim seems rushed and suspicious. If Diana were really mafia, wouldn't she deny it more convincingly? I think you might be the mafioso trying to eliminate Diana quickly."
Diana: "Bob, you're clearly trying to frame me. If you're the detective, why rush and make yourself a target? I think you're the mafioso—vote for Bob instead."
